# Compiler Options Docs

## Compiler options

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/index.md): C# Compiler Options. Learn the options that control the behavior of the C# compiler.
- [Language options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/language.md): C# Compiler Options for language feature rules. These options control how the compiler interprets certain language constructs.
- [Output options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/output.md): C# Compiler Options that control compiler output. These options control the assembly generation from a compilation.
- [Input options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/inputs.md): C# Compiler Options to control input files for compilation. These options specify how the compiler reads metadata from dependent assemblies and modules.
- [Error and warning options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/errors-warnings.md): C# Compiler Options for errors and warnings. These options suppress or enable warnings, and control warnings as errors.
- [Code generation options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/code-generation.md): C# Compiler Options to control code generation. The options affect the code generated by the compiler for a given compilation.
- [Security options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/security.md): C# Compiler Options for security. These options control signing assemblies or address space layout.
- [Resources options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resources.md): C# Compiler Options to control Windows resources embedded in a dotnet application.
- [Miscellaneous options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/miscellaneous.md): Miscellaneous C# Compiler Options. These options provide general options to the compiler.
- [Advanced options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/advanced.md): Advanced C# Compiler Options. These options are used in advanced scenarios.
